ModMetaData.name: Reuse Pods v1.4
ModMetaData.author: SomewhereOutInSpace and maintainers
ModMetaData.description:
Reuse Pods is a simple mod that adds the Pod Funnel, a spacer-tech building that soft-lands inbound pods on nearby pod launchers - thus enabling their reuse.
This version has been updated to support Rimworld v1.4
